phrs.translation: 价值主张；价值定位；价值命题
◎[口语]向某人提出一项办法(或提议)

sentences.sentence: Nowadays universities are putting much more of a focus on their brands and what their value propositions are.
sentences.translation: 如今，大学更加注重它们的品牌和价值主张。

sentences.sentence: Innovative science produces new propositions in terms of which diverse phenomena can be related to one another in more coherent ways.
sentences.translation: 创新科学会产生新的命题，使不同的现象以更连贯的方式相互关联。

sentences.sentence: They do not argue with propositions, they argue with good looks, celebrities and commercials.
sentences.translation: 他们不争论见解，他们争论美貌、名人和商业广告。
